LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.label: peach tree
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.description: Peach trees produce soft, fuzzy, sweet fruits called peaches. The peach tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of peach production.
LanguageData.Plantgrape.label: grape vine
LanguageData.Plantgrape.description: Grape vines produce small, sweet berries that grow in clusters on a single branch. These fruits are called grapes.
LanguageData.PlantOrangeTree.label: Orange tree
LanguageData.PlantOrangeTree.description: Orange trees produce soft, fuzzy, sweet fruits called Orange. The Orange tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Orange production.
LanguageData.PlantOlive.label: Olive vine
LanguageData.PlantOlive.description: Olive vines produce small, sweet berries that grow in clusters on a single branch. These fruits are called Olive.
LanguageData.PlantApple.label: Apple Tree
LanguageData.PlantApple.description: Apple Trees produce Apples. The Apple Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Apple production.
LanguageData.PlantMelon.label: Melon vine
LanguageData.PlantMelon.description: Melon vine produce Melon. It is difficult to grow. But if you succeed growing, It give you a lot of benefit.
